description: The Gloster Meteor FR.9 is a photo-reconaissance aircraft. It is a development of the F.8, with a slightly longer nose incorporting a camera that could be configured on the ground to be either overhead and oblique.
loadnotes: Stations 1 and 3 can each carry a 100 gal (450L) FT.

Ventral station 2 can only be used to carry a jettisonable conformal 175 gal (800L) FT with a weight of 1,600, 3.0/2.0 load points, and 70 fuel points. While carried, the FT restricts the maximum speed to 4.0.
